metadata.feature_description: Subscribe to posts or walls to receive notifications of new activity

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed and locate a post with Subscribe link
steps.expected: Post should display Subscribe link in post actions
steps.actual: Post displayed Subscribe link alongside Like, Comment, Remove options

steps.action: Click Subscribe link on the post
steps.expected: Subscribe link should change to Unsubscribe
steps.actual: Subscribe link immediately changed to Unsubscribe, confirming subscription was created

steps.action: Locate a subscribed post showing Unsubscribe link
steps.expected: Post should display Unsubscribe link indicating active subscription
steps.actual: Post displayed Unsubscribe link as expected

steps.action: Click Unsubscribe link on the post
steps.expected: Unsubscribe link should change back to Subscribe
steps.actual: Unsubscribe link immediately changed back to Subscribe, confirming subscription was removed

steps.action: Navigate to another user's profile (Test Admin)
steps.expected: User profile should display Follow button
steps.actual: Test Admin profile displayed with Follow button and Friend options

steps.expected: Follow button should change to Unfollow and Followers count should increase
steps.actual: Follow button changed to Unfollow and Followers count increased from 0 to 1

steps.action: On Test Admin's profile, click Unfollow button
steps.expected: Unfollow button should change back to Follow and Followers count should decrease
steps.actual: Unfollow button changed to Follow and Followers count decreased from 1 to 0

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Receive notification on subscribed post activity

steps.action: Subscribe to a post and verify comment functionality works with subscribed posts
steps.expected: Should be able to subscribe and add activity (comments) to subscribed posts
steps.actual: Successfully subscribed to post (Subscribe changed to Unsubscribe), comment area opened successfully. Subscription mechanism integrates with commenting system.

steps.action: Subscribe to a post and note the Unsubscribe status
steps.expected: Post should show Unsubscribe link after subscribing
steps.actual: First post (Anonymous with images) shows Unsubscribe link

steps.expected: Should successfully navigate to Home page
Previously subscribed post should still show Unsubscribe
steps.actual: First post (Anonymous with images, 6 minutes ago) still shows Unsubscribe, confirming subscription persisted in database

observations: The subscription API endpoints (SubscribeToPost, UnsubscribeFromPost, SubscribeToWall, UnsubscribeFromWall) are implemented in SubscriptionsController.cs
Wall subscriptions support three types: User wall (Follow), Group wall, and Activity Stream subscriptions
The Follow/Unfollow feature on user profiles is the UI mechanism for subscribing to a user's wall activity

Full notification testing requires multiple user accounts - notifications are sent to OTHER users who subscribe to content when activity occurs. Single-user testing can verify the subscription mechanism but not the actual notification delivery.
The subscription system uses the IActivityStreamSubscriptionController interface for subscription operations
Subscriptions are persisted to the database and survive page navigation/refresh
